title: Introduction
content:
Berserker is a class that is really strong in PvP, especially until the late game where Martial Saint is 'better' but harder to optimize. It's a medium class for PvE and you'll be stuck at some point, but you'll usually have a CrossBow set for Pve.

Berserker is specialized into counter-attacking dealing huge damage, strong against archers and weak against mages.

Please note that your counter attack damage do not depend of the received damages, only of your counter coefficient.

title: Guide important information
content:
Disclaimer: this guide shows you the methods and sets I use or have used in my adventure. However, many other choices are possible, and some might be even better than those suggested here. Testing everything thoroughly takes a lot of time, but I hope this guide will help you as much as possible.

If you need further help or want to discuss the strategies, feel free to join our Discord server: NoobShroom Community

title: Gear rarity upgrade
content:
From immortal equipment, you want to start focusing on substats.
Each time you'll start to get good stats on your equipment, once comes the moment you have to up its rarity.
Especially for gold equipements, you want to have at least Counter or CC before swapping, but ALWAYS take Counter + CC, even one lower gear rank.

title: Stats ratio
content:
Concerning Berserker (offensive build), we really focus to have a good balance between our Counter % and our CC %. This of course depends of your Counter Damage and your Crit Damage.
Usually, you want to aim at 80% Counter and 50% CC, depending of your equipment and your level. The more Counter you have the more you should balance your Counter and CC equally (with always counter above).

Here's a list of good ratios:

  • 80% Counter / 50% CC
  • 85% Counter / 55% CC
  • 90% Counter / 65% CC
  • 100% Counter / max possible CC

As Berserker, the mask relic allows up to exchange 10% Counter for 10% CC and vice versa, use this to be more versatile and build a good ratio

Some examples of ratios comparison, assuming you have a decent Counter coeff and Crit Dmg

  • 70% Counter / 30% CC > 80% Counter / 20% CC
  • 80% Counter / 15% CC > 90% Counter / 5% CC

title: Souls
content:
Usage tips

Several essential facts to know concerning souls:

  • Salvage any soul below a red one will destroy it permanently and refund you the entiere xp amount spent on it.
  • You cannot salvage a red one, though you can reset its level with the on top of it for 500
  • All the extra red runes you have will be used to reroll the bonus stat of your pink rune. Then you'll be able to choose the one to retain:

Pink soul acquisition order

The 'default' way and the most ballanced one is: ATK > HP > DEF > Crit Dmg

Note that you can take Combo first if you priorize PvE content to get more rewards.
You can also take DEF before HP if you lack def more then hp.


Ratio between runes

This is a good example of ratio made by several expert Berserker

Berserker wants to focus on Counter Damage of course, HP, coupled with Def, is also so much important to make as many counter attacks as possible.
Attack is taken into account into your Counter Attacks Damages.
Then you want to up more or less your Crit Dmg Soul depending of your Crit rate.
Finaly Crit Res for Pvp is pretty important.

  • lv25 | Counter Dmg
  • lv25 | HP
  • lv20 | Atk
  • lv20 | DEF
  • lv15 | Crit Dmg
  • lv15 | Res Crit Damage
  • lv5 | Basic atk
  • lv1 | Combo Dmg

"I don't think there is, for now, a perfect strategy for souls level up and I also encourage you to test by yourself!

title: Talents
content:
Note a very important info: stats upgrade are base stats for talents, which is huge



Any class you play, I can already assure you it's so worth to equalize Atk/Def/HP (either to lv10/12/14/16, depending your divine feather amount) on the your 3 different branches: fury, archery and sorcery. Indeed, these nodes are really cheap and so really worth, and the 3 first nodes are always the same (in a different order but whatever) in the 3 branches.

Then, for Berserker you absolutely want the counter damage node in the Fury branch. We also want to get 5 to 10 points in the Combo Dmg Res node.


Then you have multiple strategies depending on what you want:

  • PvE Res build: get the Basic Atk Resistance nodes to the maximum, only putting points in the required nodes in the Archery blue path, and in the Sorcery Yellow path, for waves, Cloud Ascension Trial, Chrono Tower and so on. Most of monsters only hit with basic attacks, including most bosses.
  • PvP ballanced build: get the Skill Dmg Resistance and/or Counter Dmg Resistance nodes depending on the fights where you struggle. Associated with your artefact right rune you can achieve ~35% counter resistance or ~35% combo resistance for example.
You have plenty other strategies, but these are some useful ones, join our discord to discuss about them and disover new ones !
Also, don't forget to have fun, you can infinitely reset these talents for free so why not try different strategies ?

title: Artifact Runes
content:
For reminder, you should first consider reading the tips about runes

Sets: at first (and for a long time) don't bother with sets and focus on substats,
then you must try to get 6x Crit Dmg, since this is the only place we can get global crit. Or 4x Counter & 2x Crit Dmg if you wanna build more tanky.

You must rapidly:

  • get a top right Counter Dmg rune
  • get a bottom right Crit Dmg rune if you are aggressive or Crit Res for a more tanky build or if you're Sword Master.

Know that evasion allows you to counter attack too, For the substats, you want to focus on these stats:

  • (S tier) Counter Dmg
  • (S- tier) Res Combo Damage
  • (A+ tier) Res Counter Damage
  • (A tier) Res Skill Damage>
  • (A tier) Ignore Evasion
  • (B tier) Evasion
